title: Dimple Kapadia is Akshay Kumar's best friend in Bollywood | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
Actor Akshay Kumar has said that his mother-in-law, actress Dimple Kapadia is his best friend in the film industry.
The 49-year-old actor is married to Twinkle Khanna , who is the daughter of Kapadia and late star Rajesh Khanna .
My mother-in-law :) https://t.co/1PNHZOz7ip
— Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) February 9, 2017
During a Twitter chat with fans, Akshay was asked who were his best friends from Bollywood, to which he replied, "My mother-in-law."
Charming with a great business mind :) https://t.co/Z7wiYar6il
— Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) February 9, 2017
During the fan interaction, Akshay also praised Shah Rukh Khan , by saying that the superstar is "Charming with a great business mind".
Akshay's next film 'Jolly LLB 2' will release on March 10, 2017.
